articles.title: Congress wants to force Trump’s hand on human rights in China and beyond
articles.description: Congress Wants to Force Trump’s Hand on Human Rights in China and Beyond
articles.content: WASHINGTON — In a rare show of bipartisan unity, Republicans and Democrats are planning to try to force President Donald Trump to take a more active stand on human rights in China, preparing veto-proof legislation that would punish top Chinese officials for d… [+8852 chars]

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Hollywood’s finally making films about women it has long ignored — and audiences are flocking
articles.description: Hollywood often works hard to convince us that older women aren’t appealing, that they are boring, and worse, they don’t really exist, with considerably more opportunities afforded to their male counterparts. But that might be changing | via @nytimes The post…
articles.content:
Actress Patricia Arquette began her Emmy acceptance speech in September this way: I am grateful at 50 to be getting the best parts of my life.
A few months earlier, 59-year-old actress Patricia Clarkson (Sharp Objects) said as much on the podcast WTF: Im one… [+8879 chars]
